alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Madison; Marshall; Morgan (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 12:27PM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Marshall, western Jackson, Madison and central Morgan Counties through 115 PM CST... At 1226 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Huntland to Hartselle. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Huntsville, Decatur, Madison, Scottsboro, Hartselle, Moores Mill, Redstone Arsenal, Priceville, Owens Cross Roads and Hollywood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CST for north central and northeastern Alabama.
